thread.title: China Names Xi’s Economic Adviser Vice Chairman of Securities Regulatory Agency
thread.title_full: China Names Xi’s Economic Adviser Vice Chairman of Securities Regulatory Agency - WSJ

author: Lingling Wei
title: China Names Xi’s Economic Adviser Vice Chairman of Securities Regulatory Agency
text:
BEIJING—A senior economic adviser to Chinese President Xi Jinping has been named a vice chairman of China’s top securities watchdog as the leadership looks to reshuffle the ranks of the country’s financial regulatory agencies following the government’s botched stock-market rescue efforts in the summer, according to Chinese officials with direct knowledge of the matter.
The appointment of Fang Xinghai, until recently a director-general in the Office of the Central Leading Group on Economic and Financial Affairs, was...
